taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family ORCHIDACEAE;tribe EPIDENDREAE;subtribe PLEUROTHALLIDINAE;genus Corallorhiza;species bentleyi;

bio:treatment.discussion: Corallorhiza bentleyi appears to be most similar to the small Mexican variants of C. striata that have been called C. involuta Greenman but were most recently recognized as C. striata var. involuta (Greenman) Freudenstein (J. V. Freudenstein 1999).

references.reference: Freudenstein, J. V. 1999. A new species of Corallorhiza (Orchidaceae) from West Virginia, U.S.A. Novon 9: 511–513.
